response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that I believe could significantly impact your life or business. Considering its significance and the effort put into its creation, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase this product at a price of $900,000. I understand that the true worth of such items is subjective and deeply personal, so I encourage you to consider how this product could potentially enrich your endeavors. Should you find this proposal appealing, I am more than ready to discuss the details further and facilitate the transaction promptly. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of sharing this remarkable piece with someone who appreciates its value as much as I do.", "product_price": 900000}
